to.description: Ended index of the items to return.

from.description: Started index of the items to return.

expr.description: The expression to compare to the field.

gte.description: The target field must be greater or equal to the expr value.

and.description: All the clause has to be satisfied.

lte.description: The target field must be lower or equal to the expr value.

reg_exp.description: The target field must be satisfy the regular expression in expr.

lt.description: The target field must be lower than the expr value.

not.description: The clause has to be not satisfied.

or.description: At least the clause has to be satisfied.

equals.description: The target field must be equal to the expr value.

gt.description: The target field must be greater to the expr value.

limit.description: Limit the number of items to return.

where.description: Filter the items based on different conditions.

description.example:
Could not decode the request body, either because it was not
                                                valid or because it was not encoded as UTF-8.
description.description: Human readable message that describes the error.

source.description: Path of the source parameter file

path.description: Path of the parameter value in the file

values.description: Possible values if the parameter type is choice.

list.description: Indicate if the parameter can have multiple values.

daemon.description: Key used to execute the command as daemon.

status.description: Update the status the of the agent-instance if the command is executed correctly.

description.example: Start the execution of the agent.
description.description: Short descripton of the agent actions.

description.example: Collect system metrics from execution environments.

id.description: Id of the agent in the catalog.

exec_env_id.description: Id of the execution environment where the agent instance is installed.

agent_catalog_id.description: Id of the agent in the catalog.

description.example: Collect system metrics from execution environments.
description.description: Short description of the agent installed in the execution environment.

id.description: Id of the agent instance installed in an execution environment.

exec_env_id.description: Id of the connected execution environment.

description.example: Added to this network for debug purposes.

network_link_id.description: Id of the connected network link.

timestamp_agent.description: Timestamp when the agent instance collected the data

agent_instance_id.description:
Id of the agent instance in the execution environment
                                           that collected the data

timestamp_event.description: Timestamp of the event related to the collected data

ebpf_program_instance_id.description:
Id of the eBPF program instance in the execution
                                                  environment that collected the data

help.example: This metric represents the number of packets that has traveled trough this probe.

values.description: Possible values if the parameter type is choice.

list.description: Indicate if the parameter can have multiple values.

description.example:
Transparent service to capture packets flowing through the interface it
                                 is attached to, apply filters and obtain capture in .pcap format.

id.description: Id of the eBPFProgram in the catalog.

exec_env_id.description:
Id of the execution environment where the eBPF program
                                     instance is installed

ebpf_program_catalog_id.description: Id of the agent in the catalog.

description.example: Collect system metrics from Apache HTTP Web Server.
description.description: Short description of the agent installed in the execution environment.

id.description: Id of the eBPF program installed in an execution environment.

port.description: TCP port number of LCP in the execution environment.

last_heartbeat.description: Timestamp of the expiration of the API access configuration.

started.description: Timestamp when the LCP is started

username.description: Username for the CB to connect to this LCP.

password.description: Password for the CB to connect to this LCP.

type_id.description: Id of the execution environment type.

description.description: Short description of the execution environment,

id.description: Id of the execution environment type.

description.example: Allow communication between front-end and back-end services.
description.description: Short description of the network link,

type_id.description: Id of the network link type.

description.example: Communications connection between two communication endpoints.
description.description: Short description of the network link type,

name.description: Name of the network link type.

id.description: Id of the network link type.
